section â€¹Group relationsâ€º

theory Group_Relations
  imports Finite_Product_Extend
begin

text â€¹We introduce the notion of a relation of a set of elements: a way to express the neutral
element by using only powers of said elements. The following predicate describes the set of all the
relations that one can construct from a set of elements.â€º

definition (in comm_group) relations :: "'a set â‡’ ('a â‡’ int) set" where
  "relations A = {f. finprod G (Î»a. a [^] f a) A = ğŸ­} âˆ© extensional A"

text â€¹Now some basic lemmas about relations.â€º

lemma (in comm_group) in_relationsI[intro]:
  assumes "finprod G (Î»a. a [^] f a) A = ğŸ­" "f âˆˆ extensional A"
  shows "f âˆˆ relations A"
  unfolding relations_def using assms by blast

lemma (in comm_group) triv_rel:
  "restrict (Î»_. 0::int) A âˆˆ relations A"
proof
  show "(â¨‚aâˆˆA. a [^] (Î»_âˆˆA. 0::int) a) = ğŸ­" by (intro finprod_one_eqI, simp)
qed simp

lemma (in comm_group) not_triv_relI:
  assumes "a âˆˆ A" "f a â‰  (0::int)"
  shows "f â‰  (Î»_âˆˆA. 0::int)"
  using assms by auto

lemma (in comm_group) rel_in_carr:
  assumes "A âŠ† carrier G" "r âˆˆ relations A"
  shows "(Î»a. a [^] r a) âˆˆ A â†’ carrier G"
  by (meson Pi_I assms(1) int_pow_closed subsetD)

text â€¹The following lemmas are of importance when proving the fundamental theorem of finitely
generated abelian groups in the case that there is just the trivial relation between a set of
generators. They all build up to the last lemma that then is actually used in the proof.â€º

lemma (in comm_group) relations_zero_imp_pow_not_one:
  assumes "a âˆˆ A" "âˆ€fâˆˆ(relations A). f a = 0"
  shows "âˆ€z::int â‰  0. a [^] z â‰  ğŸ­"
proof (rule ccontr; safe)
  fix z::int
  assume z: "z â‰  0" "a [^] z = ğŸ­"
  have "restrict ((Î»x. 0)(a := z)) A âˆˆ relations A"
    by (intro in_relationsI finprod_one_eqI, use z in auto)
  thus False using z assms by auto
qed

lemma (in comm_group) relations_zero_imp_ord_zero:
  assumes "a âˆˆ A" "âˆ€fâˆˆ(relations A). f a = 0"
  and "a âˆˆ carrier G"
  shows "ord a = 0"
  using assms relations_zero_imp_pow_not_one[OF assms(1, 2)]
  by (meson finite_cyclic_subgroup_int infinite_cyclic_subgroup_order)

lemma (in comm_group) finprod_relations_triv_harder_better_stronger:
  assumes "A âŠ† carrier G" "relations A = {(Î»_âˆˆA. 0::int)}"
  shows "âˆ€f âˆˆ Piâ‡©E A (Î»a. generate G {a}). finprod G f A = ğŸ­ âŸ¶ (âˆ€aâˆˆA. f a = ğŸ­)"
proof(rule, rule)
  fix f
  assume f: "f âˆˆ (Î â‡©E aâˆˆA. generate G {a})" "finprod G f A = ğŸ­"
  with generate_pow assms(1) have "âˆ€aâˆˆA. âˆƒk::int. f a = a [^] k" by auto
  then obtain r::"'a â‡’ int" where r: "âˆ€aâˆˆA. f a = a [^] r a" by metis
  have "restrict r A âˆˆ relations A"
  proof(intro in_relationsI)
    have "(â¨‚aâˆˆA. a [^] restrict r A a) = finprod G f A"
      by (intro finprod_cong, use assms r in auto)
    thus "(â¨‚aâˆˆA. a [^] restrict r A a) = ğŸ­" using f by simp
  qed simp
  with assms(2) have z: "restrict r A = (Î»_âˆˆA. 0)" by blast
  have "(restrict r A) a = r a" if "a âˆˆ A" for a using that by auto
  with r z show "âˆ€aâˆˆA. f a = ğŸ­" by auto
qed

lemma (in comm_group) stronger_PiE_finprod_imp:
  assumes "A âŠ† carrier G" "âˆ€f âˆˆ Piâ‡©E A (Î»a. generate G {a}). finprod G f A = ğŸ­ âŸ¶ (âˆ€aâˆˆA. f a = ğŸ­)"
  shows "âˆ€f âˆˆ Piâ‡©E ((Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A) id.
         finprod G f ((Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A) = ğŸ­ âŸ¶ (âˆ€Hâˆˆ (Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A. f H = ğŸ­)"
proof(rule, rule)
  fix f
  assume f: "f âˆˆ Piâ‡©E ((Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A) id" "finprod G f ((Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A) = ğŸ­"
  define B where "B = inv_into A (Î»a. generate G {a}) ` ((Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A)"
  have Bs: "B âŠ† A"
  proof
    fix x
    assume x: "x âˆˆ B"
    then obtain C where C: "C âˆˆ ((Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A)" "x = inv_into A (Î»a. generate G {a}) C"
      unfolding B_def by blast
    then obtain c where c: "C = generate G {c}" "c âˆˆ A" by blast
    with C someI_ex[of "Î»y. y âˆˆ A âˆ§ generate G {y} = C"] show "x âˆˆ A"
      unfolding inv_into_def by blast
  qed
  have sI: "(Î»x. generate G {x}) ` B = (Î»x. generate G {x}) ` A"
  proof
    show "(Î»x. generate G {x}) ` B âŠ† (Î»x. generate G {x}) ` A" using Bs by blast
    show "(Î»x. generate G {x}) ` A âŠ† (Î»x. generate G {x}) ` B"
    proof
      fix C
      assume C: "C âˆˆ (Î»x. generate G {x}) ` A"
      then obtain x where x: "x = inv_into A (Î»a. generate G {a}) C" unfolding B_def by blast
      then obtain c where c: "C = generate G {c}" "c âˆˆ A" using C by blast
      with C x someI_ex[of "Î»y. y âˆˆ A âˆ§ generate G {y} = C"] have "generate G {x} = C"
        unfolding inv_into_def by blast
      with x C show "C âˆˆ (Î»x. generate G {x}) ` B" unfolding B_def by blast
    qed
  qed
  have fBc: "f (generate G {b}) âˆˆ carrier G" if "b âˆˆ B" for b
  proof -
    have "f (generate G {b}) âˆˆ generate G {b}" using f(1)
      by (subst (asm) sI[symmetric], use that in fastforce)
    moreover have "generate G {b} âŠ† carrier G" using assms(1) that Bs generate_incl by blast
    ultimately show ?thesis by blast
  qed
  let ?r = "restrict (Î»a. if aâˆˆB then f (generate G {a}) else ğŸ­) A"
  have "?r âˆˆ Piâ‡©E A (Î»a. generate G {a})"
  proof
    show "?r x = undefined" if "x âˆ‰ A" for x using that by simp
    show "?r x âˆˆ generate G {x}" if "x âˆˆ A" for x using that generate.one B_def f(1) by auto
  qed
  moreover have "finprod G ?r A = ğŸ­"
  proof (cases "finite A")
    case True
    have "A = B âˆª (A - B)" using Bs by auto
    then have "finprod G ?r A = finprod G ?r (Bâˆª(A-B))" by auto
    moreover have "â€¦ = finprod G ?r B âŠ— finprod G ?r (A - B)"
    proof(intro finprod_Un_disjoint)
      from True Bs finite_subset show "finite B" "finite (A - B)" "B âˆ© (A - B) = {}" by auto
      show "(Î»aâˆˆA. if a âˆˆ B then f (generate G {a}) else ğŸ­) âˆˆ A - B â†’ carrier G" using Bs by simp
      from fBc show "(Î»aâˆˆA. if a âˆˆ B then f (generate G {a}) else ğŸ­) âˆˆ B â†’ carrier G"
        using Bs by auto
    qed
    moreover have "finprod G ?r B = ğŸ­"
    proof -
      have "finprod G ?r B = finprod G (f âˆ˜ (Î»a. generate G {a})) B"
      proof(intro finprod_cong')
        show "?r b = (f âˆ˜ (Î»a. generate G {a})) b" if "b âˆˆ B" for b using that Bs by auto
        show "f âˆ˜ (Î»a. generate G {a}) âˆˆ B â†’ carrier G" using fBc by simp
      qed simp
      also have "â€¦ = finprod G f ((Î»a. generate G {a}) ` B)"
      proof(intro finprod_comp[symmetric])
        show "(f âˆ˜ (Î»a. generate G {a})) ` B âŠ† carrier G" using fBc by auto
        show "inj_on (Î»a. generate G {a}) B"
          by (intro inj_onI, unfold B_def, metis (no_types, lifting) f_inv_into_f inv_into_into)
      qed
      also have "â€¦ = finprod G f ((Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A)" using sI by argo
      finally show ?thesis using f(2) by argo
    qed
    moreover have "finprod G ?r (A - B) = ğŸ­" by(intro finprod_one_eqI, simp)
    ultimately show ?thesis by fastforce
  next
    case False
    then show ?thesis unfolding finprod_def by simp
  qed
  ultimately have a: "âˆ€aâˆˆA. ?r a = ğŸ­" using assms(2) by blast
  then have BA: "âˆ€aâˆˆBâˆ©A. ?r a = ğŸ­" by blast
  from Bs sI have "âˆ€aâˆˆA. (generate G {a}) âˆˆ ((Î»x. generate G {x}) ` B)" by simp
  then have "âˆ€aâˆˆA. âˆƒbâˆˆB. f (generate G {a}) = f (generate G {b})" by force
  thus "âˆ€Hâˆˆ(Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A. f H = ğŸ­" using a BA Bs by fastforce
qed

lemma (in comm_group) finprod_relations_triv:
  assumes "A âŠ† carrier G" "relations A = {(Î»_âˆˆA. 0::int)}"
  shows "âˆ€f âˆˆ Piâ‡©E ((Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A) id.
         finprod G f ((Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A) = ğŸ­ âŸ¶ (âˆ€Hâˆˆ (Î»a. generate G {a}) ` A. f H = ğŸ­)"
  using assms finprod_relations_triv_harder_better_stronger stronger_PiE_finprod_imp by presburger

lemma (in comm_group) ord_zero_strong_imp_rel_triv:
  assumes "A âŠ† carrier G" "âˆ€a âˆˆ A. ord a = 0"
  and "âˆ€f âˆˆ Piâ‡©E A (Î»a. generate G {a}). finprod G f A = ğŸ­ âŸ¶ (âˆ€aâˆˆA. f a = ğŸ­)"
  shows "relations A = {(Î»_âˆˆA. 0::int)}"
proof -
  have "â‹€r. r âˆˆ relations A âŸ¹ r = (Î»_âˆˆA. 0::int)"
  proof
    fix r x
    assume r: "r âˆˆ relations A"
    show "r x = (Î»_âˆˆA. 0::int) x"
    proof (cases "x âˆˆ A")
      case True
      let ?r = "restrict (Î»a. a [^] r a) A"
      have rp: "?r âˆˆ Piâ‡©E A (Î»a. generate G {a})"
      proof -
        have "?r âˆˆ extensional A" by blast
        moreover have "?r âˆˆ Pi A (Î»a. generate G {a})"
        proof
          fix a
          assume a: "a âˆˆ A"
          then have sga: "subgroup (generate G {a}) G" using generate_is_subgroup assms(1) by auto
          show "a [^] r a âˆˆ generate G {a}"
            using generate.incl[of a "{a}" G] subgroup_int_pow_closed[OF sga] by simp
        qed
        ultimately show ?thesis unfolding PiE_def by blast
      qed
      have "finprod G ?r A = (â¨‚aâˆˆA. a [^] r a)" by(intro finprod_cong, use assms(1) in auto)
      with r have "finprod G ?r A = ğŸ­" unfolding relations_def by simp
      with assms(3) rp have "âˆ€aâˆˆA. ?r a = ğŸ­" by fast
      then have "âˆ€aâˆˆA. a [^] r a = ğŸ­" by simp
      with assms(1, 2) True have "r x = 0"
        using finite_cyclic_subgroup_int infinite_cyclic_subgroup_order by blast
      thus ?thesis using True by simp
    next
      case False
      thus ?thesis using r unfolding relations_def extensional_def by simp
    qed
  qed
  thus ?thesis using triv_rel by blast
qed

lemma (in comm_group) compl_fam_iff_relations_triv:
  assumes "finite gs" "gs âŠ† carrier G" "âˆ€gâˆˆgs. ord g = 0"
  shows "relations gs = {(Î»_âˆˆgs. 0::int)} âŸ· compl_fam (Î»g. generate G {g}) gs"
  using triv_finprod_iff_compl_fam_PiE[of _ "Î»g. generate G {g}", OF assms(1) generate_is_subgroup]
        ord_zero_strong_imp_rel_triv[OF assms(2, 3)]
        finprod_relations_triv_harder_better_stronger[OF assms(2)] assms by blast

end

Theory Finitely_Generated_Abelian_Groups

(*
    File:     Finitely_Generated_Abelian_Groups.thy
    Author:   Joseph Thommes, TU MÃ¼nchen
*)
section â€¹Fundamental Theorem of Finitely Generated Abelian Groupsâ€º

theory Finitely_Generated_Abelian_Groups
  imports DirProds Group_Relations
begin

notation integer_mod_group ("Z")

locale fin_gen_comm_group = comm_group +
  fixes gen :: "'a set"
  assumes gens_closed: "gen âŠ† carrier G"
  and     fin_gen: "finite gen"
  and     generators: "carrier G = generate G gen"

text â€¹Every finite abelian group is also finitely generated.â€º

sublocale finite_comm_group âŠ† fin_gen_comm_group G "carrier G"
  using generate_incl generate_sincl by (unfold_locales, auto)

text â€¹This lemma contains the proof of Kemper from his lecture notes on algebra~\cite{kemper}.
However, the proof is not done in the context of a finitely generated group but for a finitely
generated subgroup in a commutative group.â€º

lemma (in comm_group) ex_idirgen:
  fixes A :: "'a set"
  assumes "finite A" "A âŠ† carrier G"
  shows "âˆƒgs. set gs âŠ† generate G A âˆ§ distinct gs âˆ§ is_idirprod (generate G A) (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)
            âˆ§ successively (dvd) (map ord gs) âˆ§ card (set gs) â‰¤ card A"
  (is "?t A")
  using assms
proof (induction "card A" arbitrary: A rule: nat_less_induct)
  case i: 1
  show ?case
  proof (cases "relations A = {restrict (Î»_. 0::int) A}") (* only trivial relation *)
    case True
    have fi: "finite A" by fact
    then obtain gs where gs: "set gs = A" "distinct gs" by (meson finite_distinct_list)
    have o: "ord g = 0" if "g âˆˆ set gs" for g
      by (intro relations_zero_imp_ord_zero[OF that], use i(3) that True gs in auto)
    have m: "map ord gs = replicate (length gs) 0" using o
      by (induction gs; auto)
    show ?thesis
    proof(intro exI conjI subsetI)
      show "â‹€x. x âˆˆ set gs âŸ¹ x âˆˆ generate G A" using gs generate.incl[of _ A G] by blast
      show "distinct gs" by fact
      show "is_idirprod (generate G A) (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)"
      proof(unfold is_idirprod_def, intro conjI, rule)
        show "generate G {g} âŠ² G" if "g âˆˆ set gs" for g
          by (intro subgroup_imp_normal, use that generate_is_subgroup i(3) gs in auto)
        show "generate G A = IDirProds G (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)" unfolding IDirProds_def
          by (subst gs(1), use generate_idem_Un i(3) in blast)
        show "compl_fam (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)" using compl_fam_iff_relations_triv[OF i(2, 3)] o gs(1) True
          by blast 
      qed
      show "successively (dvd) (map ord gs)" using m
      proof (induction gs)
        case c: (Cons a gs)
        thus ?case by(cases gs; simp)
      qed simp
      show "card (set gs) â‰¤ card A" using gs by blast
    qed
  next
    case ntrel: False
    then have Ane: "A â‰  {}"
      using i(2) triv_rel[of A] unfolding relations_def extensional_def by fastforce
    from ntrel obtain a where a: "a âˆˆ A" "âˆƒr âˆˆrelations A. r a â‰  0" using i(2) triv_rel[of A]
      unfolding relations_def extensional_def by fastforce
    hence ac: "a âˆˆ carrier G" using i(3) by blast
    have iH: "â‹€B.âŸ¦card B < card A; finite B; B âŠ† carrier GâŸ§ âŸ¹ ?t B"
      using i(1) by blast
    have iH2: "â‹€B. âŸ¦?t B; generate G A = generate G B; card B < card AâŸ§ âŸ¹ ?t A"
      by fastforce
    show ?thesis
    proof(cases "inv a âˆˆ (A - {a})")
      case True
      have "generate G A = generate G (A - {a})"
      proof(intro generate_subset_eqI[OF i(3)])
        show "A - (A - {a}) âŠ† generate G (A - {a})"
        proof -
          have "A - (A - {a}) = {a}" using a True by auto
          also have "â€¦ âŠ† generate G {inv a}" using generate.inv[of "inv a" "{inv a}" G] ac by simp
          also have "â€¦ âŠ† generate G (A - {a})" by (intro mono_generate, use True in simp)
          finally show ?thesis .
        qed
      qed simp
      moreover have "?t (A - {a})"
        by (intro iH[of "A - {a}"], use i(2, 3) a(1) in auto, meson Ane card_gt_0_iff diff_Suc_less)
      ultimately show ?thesis using card.remove[OF i(2) a(1)] by fastforce
    next
      case inv: False
      define n where n: "n = card A"
      define all_gens where
        "all_gens = {gsâˆˆPow (generate G A). finite gs âˆ§ card gs â‰¤ n âˆ§ generate G gs = generate G A}"

      define exps where "exps = (â‹ƒgs'âˆˆall_gens. â‹ƒrelâˆˆrelations gs'. nat ` {eâˆˆrel`gs'. e > 0})"
      define min_exp where "min_exp = Inf exps"

      have "exps â‰  {}"
      proof -
        let ?B = "A - {a} âˆª {inv a}"
        have "A âˆˆ all_gens" unfolding all_gens_def using generate.incl n i(2) by fast
        moreover have "?B âˆˆ all_gens"
        proof -
          have "card (A - {a}) = n - 1" using a n by (meson card_Diff_singleton_if i(2))
          hence "card ?B = n" using inv i(2, 3) n a(1)
            by (metis Un_empty_right Un_insert_right card.remove card_insert_disjoint finite_Diff) 
          moreover have "generate G A = generate G ?B"
          proof(intro generate_one_switched_eqI[OF i(3) a(1), of _ "inv a"])
            show "inv a âˆˆ generate G A" using generate.inv[OF a(1), of G] .
            show "a âˆˆ generate G ?B"
            proof -
              have "a âˆˆ generate G {inv a}" using generate.inv[of "inv a" "{inv a}" G] ac by simp
              also have "â€¦ âŠ† generate G ?B" by (intro mono_generate, blast)
              finally show ?thesis .
            qed
          qed simp
          moreover hence "?B âŠ† generate G A" using generate_sincl by simp
          ultimately show ?thesis unfolding all_gens_def using i(2) by blast
        qed
        moreover have "(âˆƒr âˆˆ relations A. r a > 0) âˆ¨ (âˆƒr âˆˆ relations ?B. r (inv a) > 0)"
        proof(cases "âˆƒr âˆˆ relations A. r a > 0")
          case True
          then show ?thesis by blast
        next
          case False
          with a obtain r where r: "r âˆˆ relations A" "r a < 0" by force
          have rc: "(Î»x. x [^] r x) âˆˆ A â†’ carrier G" using i(3) int_pow_closed by fast
          let ?r = "restrict (r(inv a := - r a)) ?B"
          have "?r âˆˆ relations ?B"
          proof
            have "finprod G (Î»x. x [^] ?r x) ?B = finprod G (Î»x. x [^] r x) A"
            proof -
              have "finprod G (Î»x. x [^] ?r x) ?B
                  = finprod G (Î»x. x [^] ?r x) (insert (inv a) (A - {a}))" by simp
              also have "â€¦ = (inv a) [^] ?r (inv a) âŠ— finprod G (Î»x. x [^] ?r x) (A - {a})"
              proof(intro finprod_insert[OF _ inv])
                show "finite (A - {a})" using i(2) by fast
                show "inv a [^] ?r (inv a) âˆˆ carrier G"
                  using int_pow_closed[OF inv_closed[OF ac]] by fast
                show "(Î»x. x [^] ?r x) âˆˆ A - {a} â†’ carrier G" using int_pow_closed i(3) by fast
              qed
              also have "â€¦ = a [^] r a âŠ— finprod G (Î»x. x [^] r x) (A - {a})"
              proof -
                have "(inv a) [^] ?r (inv a) = a [^] r a"
                  by (simp add: int_pow_inv int_pow_neg ac)
                moreover have "finprod G (Î»x. x [^] r x) (A - {a})
                             = finprod G (Î»x. x [^] ?r x) (A - {a})"
                proof(intro finprod_cong)
                  show "((Î»x. x [^] r x) âˆˆ A - {a} â†’ carrier G) = True" using rc by blast
                  have "i [^] r i = i [^] ?r i" if "i âˆˆ A - {a}" for i using that inv by auto
                  thus "â‹€i. i âˆˆ A - {a} =simp=> i [^] r i = i [^] restrict (r(inv a := - r a)) (A - {a} âˆª {inv a}) i"
                    by algebra
                qed simp
                ultimately show ?thesis by argo
              qed
              also have "â€¦ = finprod G (Î»x. x [^] r x) A"
                by (intro finprod_minus[symmetric, OF a(1) rc i(2)])
              finally show ?thesis .
            qed
            also have "â€¦ = ğŸ­" using r unfolding relations_def by fast
            finally show "finprod G (Î»x. x [^] ?r x) ?B = ğŸ­" .
          qed simp
          then show ?thesis using r by fastforce
        qed
        ultimately show ?thesis unfolding exps_def using a by blast
      qed
      hence me: "min_exp âˆˆ exps"
        unfolding min_exp_def using Inf_nat_def1 by force
      from cInf_lower min_exp_def have le: "â‹€x. x âˆˆ exps âŸ¹ min_exp â‰¤ x" by blast
      from me obtain gs rel g
        where gr: "gs âˆˆ all_gens" "rel âˆˆ relations gs" "g âˆˆ gs" "rel g = min_exp" "min_exp > 0"
        unfolding exps_def by auto
      from gr(1) have cgs: "card gs â‰¤ card A" unfolding all_gens_def n by blast
      with gr(3) have cgsg: "card (gs - {g}) < card A"
        by (metis Ane card.infinite card_Diff1_less card_gt_0_iff finite.emptyI
                  finite.insertI finite_Diff2 i.prems(1) le_neq_implies_less less_trans)
      from gr(1) have fgs: "finite gs" and gsg: "generate G gs = generate G A"
        unfolding all_gens_def n using i(2) card.infinite Ane by force+
      from gsg have gsc: "gs âŠ† carrier G" unfolding all_gens_def
        using generate_incl[OF i(3)] generate_sincl[of gs] by simp
      hence gc: "g âˆˆ carrier G" using gr(3) by blast
      have ihgsg: "?t (gs - {g})"
        by (intro iH, use cgs fgs gsc gr(3) cgsg in auto)
      then obtain hs where
        hs: "set hs âŠ† generate G (gs - {g})" "distinct hs"
            "is_idirprod (generate G (gs - {g})) (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set hs)"
            "successively (dvd) (map ord hs)" "card (set hs) â‰¤ card (gs - {g})" by blast
      hence hsc: "set hs âŠ† carrier G"
        using generate_sincl[of "set hs"] generate_incl[of "gs - {g}"] gsc by blast
      from hs(3) have ghs: "generate G (gs - {g}) = generate G (set hs)"
        unfolding is_idirprod_def IDirProds_def using generate_idem_Un[OF hsc] by argo
      have dvot: "?t A âˆ¨ (âˆ€eâˆˆrel`gs. rel g dvd e)"
      proof(intro disjCI)
        assume na: "Â¬ (âˆ€eâˆˆrel ` gs. rel g dvd e)"
        have "â‹€x. âŸ¦x âˆˆ gs; Â¬rel g dvd rel xâŸ§ âŸ¹ ?t A"
        proof -
          fix x
          assume x: "x âˆˆ gs" "Â¬ rel g dvd rel x"
          hence xng: "x â‰  g" by auto
          from x have xc: "x âˆˆ carrier G" using gsc by blast
          have rg: "rel g > 0" using gr by simp
          define r::int where r: "r = rel x mod rel g"
          define q::int where q: "q = rel x div rel g"
          from r rg x have "r > 0"
            using mod_int_pos_iff[of "rel x" "rel g"] mod_eq_0_iff_dvd by force
          moreover have "r < rel g" using r rg Euclidean_Division.pos_mod_bound by blast
          moreover have "rel x = q * rel g + r" using r q by presburger
          ultimately have rq: "rel x = q * (rel g) + r" "0 < r" "r < rel g" by auto
          define t where t: "t = g âŠ— x [^] q"
          hence tc: "t âˆˆ carrier G" using gsc gr(3) x by fast
          define s where s: "s = gs - {g} âˆª {t}"
          hence fs: "finite s" using fgs by blast
          have sc: "s âŠ† carrier G" using s tc gsc by blast
          have g: "generate G gs = generate G s"
          proof(unfold s, intro generate_one_switched_eqI[OF gsc gr(3), of _ t])
            show "t âˆˆ generate G gs"
            proof(unfold t, intro generate.eng)
              show "g âˆˆ generate G gs" using gr(3) generate.incl by fast
              show "x [^] q âˆˆ generate G gs"
                using x generate_pow[OF xc] generate_sincl[of "{x}"] mono_generate[of "{x}" gs]
                by fast
            qed
            show "g âˆˆ generate G (gs - {g} âˆª {t})"
            proof -
              have gti: "g = t âŠ— inv (x [^] q)"
                using inv_solve_right[OF gc tc int_pow_closed[OF xc, of q]] t by blast
              moreover have "t âˆˆ generate G (gs - {g} âˆª {t})" by (intro generate.incl[of t], simp)
              moreover have "inv (x [^] q) âˆˆ generate G (gs - {g})"
              proof -
                have "x [^] q âˆˆ generate G {x}" using generate_pow[OF xc] by blast
                from generate_m_inv_closed[OF _ this] xc
                have "inv (x [^] q) âˆˆ generate G {x}" by blast
                moreover have "generate G {x} âŠ† generate G (gs - {g})"
                  by (intro mono_generate, use x a in force)
                finally show ?thesis .
              qed
              ultimately show ?thesis
                using generate.eng mono_generate[of "gs - {g}" "gs - {g} âˆª {t}"] by fast
            qed
          qed simp

      show "?t A"

                            by argo
                          also have "â€¦ = a [^] (q * int (ord tau) + r)" using Cons hsc
                            by (metis comm_group_axioms comm_group_def group.int_pow_pow
                                      int_pow_mult list.set_intros(1) subsetD)
                          also have "â€¦ = a [^] int (ord a)" using rq by argo
                          finally show ?thesis using Cons hsc int_pow_eq_id by simp
                        qed
                        finally show ?thesis .
                      qed
                    qed simp
                    moreover have "r âˆˆ {e âˆˆ ?r ` set (b # hs). 0 < e}"
                    proof (rule, rule, rule)
                      show "0 < r" by fact
                      show "a âˆˆ set (b#hs)" using Cons by simp
                      thus "r = ?r a" by auto
                    qed
                    ultimately show "nat r âˆˆ (â‹ƒrelâˆˆrelations (set (b # hs)). nat ` {e âˆˆ rel ` set (b # hs). 0 < e})"
                      by fast
                  qed
                  moreover have "nat r < min_exp" using ot rq(2, 3) gr(4) by linarith
                  ultimately show False using le by fastforce
                qed
              qed
              thus ?thesis using hs(4) Cons l by simp
            qed
            ultimately show ?thesis using lgA n dn by (metis card_length)
          qed
        qed
      qed (use dvot in blast)
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma (in comm_group) fundamental_subgr:
  fixes A :: "'a set"
  assumes "finite A" "A âŠ† carrier G"
  obtains gs where
    "set gs âŠ† generate G A" "distinct gs" "is_idirprod (generate G A) (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)"
    "successively (dvd) (map ord gs)" "card (set gs) â‰¤ card A"
  using assms ex_idirgen by meson

text â€¹As every group is a subgroup of itself, the theorem follows directly. However, for reasons of
convenience and uniqueness (although not completely proved), we strengthen the result by proving
that the decomposition can be done without having the trivial factor in the product.
We formulate the theorem in various ways: firstly, the invariant factor decomposition.â€º

theorem (in fin_gen_comm_group) invariant_factor_decomposition_idirprod:
  obtains gs where
    "set gs âŠ† carrier G" "distinct gs" "is_idirprod (carrier G) (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)"
    "successively (dvd) (map ord gs)" "card (set gs) â‰¤ card gen" "ğŸ­ âˆ‰ set gs"
proof -
  from fundamental_subgr[OF fin_gen gens_closed] obtain gs where
  gs: "set gs âŠ† carrier G" "distinct gs" "is_idirprod (carrier G) (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)"
    "successively (dvd) (map ord gs)" "card (set gs) â‰¤ card gen" using generators by auto
  hence cf: "compl_fam (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)" by simp
  let ?r = "remove1 ğŸ­ gs"
  have r: "set ?r = set gs - {ğŸ­}" using gs by auto
  have "set ?r âŠ† carrier G" using gs by auto
  moreover have "distinct ?r" using gs by auto
  moreover have "is_idirprod (carrier G) (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set ?r)"
  proof (intro is_idirprod_generate)
    show "set ?r âŠ† carrier G" using gs by auto
    show "compl_fam (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set (remove1 ğŸ­ gs))"
      by (rule compl_fam_generate_subset[OF cf gs(1)], use set_remove1_subset in fastforce)
    show "carrier G = generate G (set ?r)"
    proof -
      have "generate G (set ?r) = generate G (set gs)" using generate_one_irrel' r by simp
      with gs(3) show ?thesis by simp
    qed
  qed
  moreover have "successively (dvd) (map ord ?r)"
  proof (cases gs)
    case (Cons a list)
    have r: "(map ord (remove1 ğŸ­ gs)) = remove1 1 (map ord gs)" using gs(1) 
    proof(induction gs)
      case (Cons a gs)
      hence "a âˆˆ carrier G" by simp
      with Cons ord_eq_1[OF this] show ?case by auto
    qed simp
    show ?thesis by (unfold r,
                     rule transp_successively_remove1[OF _ gs(4), unfolded transp_def],
                     auto)
  qed simp
  moreover have "card (set ?r) â‰¤ card gen" using gs(5) r
    by (metis List.finite_set card_Diff1_le dual_order.trans)
  moreover have "ğŸ­ âˆ‰ set ?r" using gs(2) by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis using that by blast
qed

corollary (in fin_gen_comm_group) invariant_factor_decomposition_dirprod:
  obtains gs where
    "set gs âŠ† carrier G" "distinct gs"
    "DirProds (Î»g. Gâ¦‡carrier := generate G {g}â¦ˆ) (set gs) â‰… G"
    "successively (dvd) (map ord gs)" "card (set gs) â‰¤ card gen"
    "compl_fam (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)" "ğŸ­ âˆ‰ set gs"
proof -
  from invariant_factor_decomposition_idirprod obtain gs where
    gs: "set gs âŠ† carrier G" "distinct gs" "is_idirprod (carrier G) (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)"
        "successively (dvd) (map ord gs)" "card (set gs) â‰¤ card gen" "ğŸ­ âˆ‰ set gs" by blast
  with cong_DirProds_IDirProds[OF gs(3)] gs 
  have "DirProds (Î»g. Gâ¦‡carrier := generate G {g}â¦ˆ) (set gs) â‰… G" by blast
  with gs that show ?thesis by auto
qed

corollary (in fin_gen_comm_group) invariant_factor_decomposition_dirprod_fam:
  obtains Hs where
    "â‹€H. H âˆˆ set Hs âŸ¹ subgroup H G" "distinct Hs"
    "DirProds (Î»H. Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ) (set Hs) â‰… G" "successively (dvd) (map card Hs)"
    "card (set Hs) â‰¤ card gen" "compl_fam id (set Hs)" "{ğŸ­} âˆ‰ set Hs"
proof -
  from invariant_factor_decomposition_dirprod obtain gs where
  gs: "set gs âŠ† carrier G" "distinct gs"
      "DirProds (Î»g. Gâ¦‡carrier := generate G {g}â¦ˆ) (set gs) â‰… G"
      "successively (dvd) (map ord gs)" "card (set gs) â‰¤ card gen"
      "compl_fam (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)" "ğŸ­ âˆ‰ set gs" by blast
  let ?gen = "(Î»g. generate G {g})"
  let ?Hs = "map (Î»g. ?gen g) gs"
  have "subgroup H G" if "H âˆˆ set ?Hs" for H using that gs by (auto intro: generate_is_subgroup)
  moreover have "distinct ?Hs"
    using compl_fam_imp_generate_inj[OF gs(1)] gs distinct_map by blast
  moreover have "DirProds (Î»H. Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ) (set ?Hs) â‰… G"
  proof -
    have gg: "group (Gâ¦‡carrier := ?gen gâ¦ˆ)" if "g âˆˆ set gs" for g
      by (use gs that in â€¹auto intro: subgroup.subgroup_is_group generate_is_subgroupâ€º)
    then interpret og: group "DirProds (Î»g. Gâ¦‡carrier := ?gen gâ¦ˆ) (set gs)"
      using DirProds_group_iff by blast
    have "DirProds (Î»g. Gâ¦‡carrier := ?gen gâ¦ˆ) (set gs) â‰… DirProds (Î»H. Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ) (set ?Hs)"
    proof (intro DirProds_iso[of ?gen])
      show "bij_betw ?gen (set gs) (set ?Hs)"
        using â€¹distinct ?Hsâ€º gs(2) compl_fam_imp_generate_inj[OF gs(1, 6)]
        by (simp add: bij_betw_def)
      show "Gâ¦‡carrier := ?gen gâ¦ˆ â‰… Gâ¦‡carrier := ?gen gâ¦ˆ" if "g âˆˆ set gs" for g by simp
      show "group (Gâ¦‡carrier := ?gen gâ¦ˆ)" if "g âˆˆ set gs" for g using that by fact
      show "Group.group (Gâ¦‡carrier := Hâ¦ˆ)" if "H âˆˆ set ?Hs" for H
        by (use gs that in â€¹auto intro: subgroup.subgroup_is_group generate_is_subgroupâ€º)
    qed
    from group.iso_sym[OF og.is_group this] show ?thesis using gs iso_trans by blast
  qed
  moreover have "successively (dvd) (map card ?Hs)"
  proof -
    have "card (generate G {g}) = ord g" if "g âˆˆ set gs" for g
      using generate_pow_card that gs(1) by auto
    hence "map card ?Hs = map ord gs" by simp
    thus ?thesis using gs(4) by argo
  qed
  moreover have "card (set ?Hs) â‰¤ card gen" using gs
    by (metis â€¹distinct ?Hsâ€º distinct_card length_map)
  moreover have "compl_fam id (set ?Hs)"
    using compl_fam_cong[OF _ compl_fam_imp_generate_inj[OF gs(1, 6)], of id] using gs by auto
  moreover have "{ğŸ­} âˆ‰ set ?Hs" using generate_singleton_one gs by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis using that by blast
qed

text â€¹Here, the invariant factor decomposition in its classical form.â€º

corollary (in fin_gen_comm_group) invariant_factor_decomposition_Zn:
  obtains ns where
    "DirProds (Î»n. Z (ns!n)) {..<length ns} â‰… G" "successively (dvd) ns" "length ns â‰¤ card gen"
proof -
  from invariant_factor_decomposition_dirprod obtain gs where
      gs: "set gs âŠ† carrier G" "distinct gs"
          "DirProds (Î»g. Gâ¦‡carrier := generate G {g}â¦ˆ) (set gs) â‰… G"
          "successively (dvd) (map ord gs)" "card (set gs) â‰¤ card gen"
          "compl_fam (Î»g. generate G {g}) (set gs)" "ğŸ­ âˆ‰ set gs" by blast
  let ?DP = "DirProds (Î»g. Gâ¦‡carrier := generate G {g}â¦ˆ) (set gs)"
  have "âˆƒns. DirProds (Î»n. Z (ns!n)) {..<length ns} â‰… G
           âˆ§ successively (dvd) ns âˆ§ length ns â‰¤ card gen"
  proof (cases gs, rule)
    case Nil
    from gs(3) Nil have co: "carrier ?DP = {ğŸ­â‡˜?DPâ‡™}" unfolding DirProds_def by auto
    let ?ns = "[]"
    have "DirProds (Î»n. Z ([] ! n)) {} â‰… ?DP"
    proof(intro triv_iso DirProds_is_group)
      show "carrier (DirProds (Î»n. Z ([] ! n)) {}) = {ğŸ­â‡˜DirProds (Î»n. Z ([] ! n)) {}â‡™}"
        using DirProds_empty by blast
    qed (use co group_integer_mod_group Nil in auto)
    from that[of ?ns] gs co iso_trans[OF this gs(3)]
    show "DirProds (Î»n. Z (?ns ! n)) {..<length ?ns} â‰… G
        âˆ§ successively (dvd) ?ns âˆ§ length ?ns â‰¤ card gen"
      unfolding lessThan_def by simp
  next
    case c: (Cons a list)    
    let ?l = "map ord gs"
    from c have l: "length ?l > 0" by auto
    have "DirProds (Î»n. Z (?l ! n)) {..<length ?l} â‰… G"
    proof -
      have "DirProds (Î»n. Z (?l ! n)) {..<length ?l} â‰… ?DP"
      proof(intro DirProds_iso[where ?f = "Î»n. gs!n"])
        show "bij_betw ((!) gs) {..<length ?l} (set gs)" using gs
          by (simp add: bij_betw_nth)
        show "Z (map ord gs ! i) â‰… Gâ¦‡carrier := generate G {gs ! i}â¦ˆ" if "i âˆˆ {..<length ?l}" for i
        proof(rule group.iso_sym[OF subgroup.subgroup_is_group[OF generate_is_subgroup]
                   cyclic_group.Zn_iso[OF cyclic_groupI2]])
          show "order (Gâ¦‡carrier := generate G {gs ! i}â¦ˆ) = map ord gs ! i"
            unfolding order_def using that generate_pow_card[of "gs ! i"] gs(1) by force
        qed (use gs(1) that in auto)
        show "Group.group (Z (map ord gs ! i))" if "i âˆˆ {..<length (map ord gs)}" for i
          using group_integer_mod_group by blast
        show "Group.group (Gâ¦‡carrier := generate G {g}â¦ˆ)" if "g âˆˆ set gs" for g
          using that gs(1) subgroup.subgroup_is_group[OF generate_is_subgroup] by auto
      qed
      from iso_trans[OF this gs(3)] show ?thesis .
    qed
    moreover have "length ?l â‰¤ card gen" using gs by (metis distinct_card length_map)
    ultimately show ?thesis using gs c by fastforce
  qed
  thus ?thesis using that by blast
qed

text â€¹As every â€¹integer_mod_groupâ€º can be decomposed into a product of prime power groups,
we obtain (by using the fact that the direct product does not care about nestedness)
the primary decomposition.â€º

lemma Zn_iso_DirProds_prime_powers:
  assumes "n â‰  0"
  shows "Z n â‰… DirProds (Î»p. Z (p ^ multiplicity p n)) (prime_factors n)" (is "Z n â‰… ?DP")
proof (cases "n = 1")
  case True
  show ?thesis by (intro triv_iso[OF group_integer_mod_group DirProds_is_group],
                   use DirProds_empty carrier_integer_mod_group True in auto)
next
  case nno: False
  interpret DP: group ?DP by (intro DirProds_is_group, use group_integer_mod_group in blast)
  have "order ?DP = prod (order âˆ˜ (Î»p. Z (p ^ multiplicity p n))) (prime_factors n)"
    by (intro DirProds_order, blast)
  also have "â€¦ = prod (Î»p. p ^ multiplicity p n) (prime_factors n)" using Zn_order by simp
  also have n: "â€¦ = n" using prod_prime_factors[OF assms] by simp
  finally have oDP: "order ?DP = n" .
  then interpret DP: finite_group ?DP
    by (unfold_locales, unfold order_def, metis assms card.infinite)
  let ?f = "Î»pâˆˆ(prime_factors n). 1"
  have fc: "?f âˆˆ carrier ?DP"
  proof -
    have p: "0 < multiplicity p n" if "p âˆˆ prime_factors n" for p
      using prime_factors_multiplicity that by auto
    have pk: "1 < p ^ k" if "Factorial_Ring.prime p" "0 < k" for p k::nat
      using that one_less_power prime_gt_1_nat by blast
    show ?thesis unfolding DirProds_def PiE_def
      by(use carrier_integer_mod_group assms nno pk p in auto,
         metis in_prime_factors_iff nat_int of_nat_power one_less_nat_eq)
  qed
  have of: "DP.ord ?f = n"
  proof -
    have "n dvd j" if j: "?f [^]â‡˜?DPâ‡™ j = ğŸ­â‡˜?DPâ‡™" for j
    proof (intro pairwise_coprime_dvd'[OF _ _ n[symmetric]])
      show "finite (prime_factors n)" by simp
      show "âˆ€aâˆˆ#prime_factorization n. a ^ multiplicity a n dvd j"
      proof 
        show "p ^ multiplicity p n dvd j" if "p âˆˆ prime_factors n" for p
        proof -
          from j have "(?f [^]â‡˜?DPâ‡™ j) p = 0"
            using that unfolding DirProds_def one_integer_mod_group by auto
          hence "?f p [^]â‡˜Z (p ^ multiplicity p n)â‡™ j = 0" using comp_exp_nat[OF that] by metis
          hence "group.ord (Z (p ^ multiplicity p n)) (?f p) dvd j" using comp_in_carr[OF fc that]
            by (metis group.pow_eq_id group_integer_mod_group one_integer_mod_group)
          moreover have "group.ord (Z (p ^ multiplicity p n)) (?f p) = p ^ multiplicity p n"
            by (metis (no_types, lifting) Zn_neq1_cyclic_group Zn_order comp_in_carr
                                          cyclic_group.ord_gen_is_group_order fc integer_mod_group_1
                                          restrict_apply' that)
          ultimately show ?thesis by simp
        qed
      qed
      show "coprime (i ^ multiplicity i n) (j ^ multiplicity j n)"
        if "i âˆˆ# prime_factorization n" "j âˆˆ# prime_factorization n" "i â‰  j" for i j
        using that diff_prime_power_imp_coprime by blast
    qed
    thus ?thesis using fc DP.ord_dvd_group_order gcd_nat.asym oDP by force
  qed
  interpret DP: cyclic_group ?DP ?f by (intro DP.element_ord_generates_cyclic, use of oDP fc in auto)
  show ?thesis using DP.iso_sym[OF DP.Zn_iso[OF oDP]] .
qed

lemma Zn_iso_DirProds_prime_powers':
  assumes "n â‰  0"
  shows "Z n â‰… DirProds (Î»p. Z p) ((Î»p. p ^ multiplicity p n) ` (prime_factors n))" (is "Z n â‰… ?DP")
proof -
  have cp: "(Î»p. Z (p ^ multiplicity p n)) = (Î»p. Z p) âˆ˜ (Î»p. p ^ multiplicity p n)" by auto
  have "DirProds (Î»p. Z (p ^ multiplicity p n)) (prime_factors n) â‰… ?DP"
  proof(subst cp, intro DirProds_iso2)
    show "inj_on (Î»p. p ^ multiplicity p n) (prime_factors n)"
      by (intro inj_onI; simp add: prime_factors_multiplicity prime_power_inj'')
    show "group (DirProds Z ((Î»p. p ^ multiplicity p n) ` prime_factors n))"
      by (intro DirProds_is_group, use group_integer_mod_group in auto)
  qed
  with Zn_iso_DirProds_prime_powers[OF assms] show ?thesis using Group.iso_trans by blast
qed

corollary (in fin_gen_comm_group) primary_decomposition_Zn:
  obtains ns where
    "DirProds (Î»n. Z (ns!n)) {..<length ns} â‰… G"
    "âˆ€nâˆˆset ns. n = 0 âˆ¨ (âˆƒp k. Factorial_Ring.prime p âˆ§ k > 0 âˆ§ n = p ^ k)"
proof -
  from invariant_factor_decomposition_Zn obtain ms where
    ms: "DirProds (Î»m. Z (ms!m)) {..<length ms} â‰… G" "successively (dvd) ms" "length ms â‰¤ card gen"
    by blast
  let ?I = "{..<length ms}"
  let ?J = "Î»i. if ms!i = 0 then {0} else (Î»p. p ^ multiplicity p (ms!i)) ` (prime_factors (ms!i))"
  let ?G = "Î»i. Z"
  let ?f = "Î»i. DirProds (?G i) (?J i)"
  have "DirProds (Î»m. Z (ms!m)) {..<length ms} â‰… DirProds ?f {..<length ms}"
  proof (intro DirProds_iso[of id])
    show "bij_betw id {..<length ms} {..<length ms}" by blast
    show "Z (ms ! i) â‰… ?f (id i)" if "i âˆˆ {..<length ms}" for i
      by (cases "ms!i = 0",
          simp add: DirProds_one_cong_sym,
          auto intro: Zn_iso_DirProds_prime_powers')
    show "â‹€i. i âˆˆ {..<length ms} âŸ¹ group (Z (ms ! i))" by auto
    show "group (?f j)" if "j âˆˆ {..<length ms}" for j by (auto intro: DirProds_is_group)
  qed
  also have "â€¦ â‰… DirProds (Î»(i,j). ?G i j) (Sigma ?I ?J)"
    by(rule DirProds_Sigma)
  finally have G1: "G â‰… DirProds (Î»(i,j). ?G i j) (Sigma ?I ?J)" using ms(1)
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) DirProds_is_group Group.iso_trans group.iso_sym group_integer_mod_group)
  have "âˆƒps. set ps = Sigma ?I ?J âˆ§ distinct ps" by(intro finite_distinct_list, auto)
  then obtain ps where ps: "set ps = Sigma ?I ?J" "distinct ps" by blast
  define ns where ns: "ns = map snd ps"
  have "DirProds (Î»n. Z (ns!n)) {..<length ns} â‰… DirProds (Î»(i,j). ?G i j) (Sigma ?I ?J)"
  proof -
    obtain b::"nat â‡’ (nat Ã— nat)"
      where b: "âˆ€i<length ns. ns!i = snd (b i)" "bij_betw b {..<length ns} (Sigma ?I ?J)"
      using ns ps bij_betw_nth by fastforce
    moreover have "Z (ns ! i) â‰… (case b i of (i, x) â‡’ Z x)" if "i âˆˆ {..<length ns}" for i
    proof -
      have "ns ! i = snd (b i)" using b that by blast
      thus ?thesis by (simp add: case_prod_beta)
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis by (auto intro: DirProds_iso)
  qed
  with G1 have "DirProds (Î»n. Z (ns!n)) {..<length ns} â‰… G" using Group.iso_trans iso_sym by blast
  moreover have "n = 0 âˆ¨ (âˆƒp k. Factorial_Ring.prime p âˆ§ k > 0 âˆ§ n = p ^ k)" if "nâˆˆset ns" for n
  proof -
    have "k = 0 âˆ¨ (âˆƒpâˆˆprime_factors (ms!i). k = p ^ multiplicity p (ms!i))" if "k âˆˆ ?J i" for k i
      by (cases "ms!i = 0", use that in auto)
    with that ns ps show ?thesis
      by (auto, metis (no_types, lifting) mem_Collect_eq neq0_conv prime_factors_multiplicity)
  qed
  ultimately show
  "(â‹€ns. âŸ¦DirProds (Î»n. Z (ns ! n)) {..<length ns} â‰… G;
          âˆ€nâˆˆset ns. n = 0 âˆ¨ (âˆƒp k. Factorial_Ring.prime p âˆ§ k > 0 âˆ§ n = p ^ k)âŸ§ âŸ¹ thesis)
    âŸ¹ thesis" by blast
qed

text â€¹As every finite group is also finitely generated, it follows that a finite group can be
decomposed in a product of finite cyclic groups.â€º

lemma (in finite_comm_group) cyclic_product:
  obtains ns where "DirProds (Î»n. Z (ns!n)) {..<length ns} â‰… G" "âˆ€nâˆˆset ns. nâ‰ 0"
proof -
  from primary_decomposition_Zn obtain ns where
    ns: "DirProds (Î»n. Z (ns ! n)) {..<length ns} â‰… G"
        "âˆ€nâˆˆset ns. n = 0 âˆ¨ (âˆƒp k. normalization_semidom_class.prime p âˆ§ 0 < k âˆ§ n = p ^ k)"
    by blast
  have "False" if "n âˆˆ {..<length ns}" "ns!n = 0" for n
  proof -
    from that have "order (DirProds (Î»n. Z (ns ! n)) {..<length ns}) = 0"
      using DirProds_order[of "{..<length ns}" "Î»n. Z (ns!n)"] Zn_order by auto
    with fin iso_same_card[OF ns(1)] show False unfolding order_def by auto
  qed
  hence "âˆ€nâˆˆset ns. nâ‰ 0"
    by (metis in_set_conv_nth lessThan_iff)
  with ns show ?thesis using that by blast
qed

no_notation integer_mod_group ("Z")
